content.detailedDescription:
I have been going outside in the back patio of my house to smoke. i do not smoke in the house. there really isn't much to see but i began to see blinking red lights in one direction. its hard to pinpoint how far,but it seemed to be coming from around the other end of the property,in the back of my house.   they are always there only at night. i decided today that i would investigate and find out just where those lights might be coming from.
    there are very many trees here, mainly oak and some pines. anyway, the lights,vivid red have been blinking for several months. then today in the day time, i rode around my block and look for something, like christmes lights, or any other lights that appeared to be simular in appearance. i couldnt find anything.
      tonight about 11:40 pm,i went out of my back door and saw the red blinking lights dart about about from their usual place and go higher into the sky,but not too high. there is only one red light darting here and there, left and right,up and down. i dont know what it is, and im the only one that goes out to smoke at night. this is a sparsely populated area and i am concerned and curious at this time.
    i have been going out side to smoke for several months now and those lights have always been in the same area. tonight for the first time,they changed and moved away and up and down.They are still back there as i write this narritive.
     i do not have a camara or film to take pictures of the blinking red lights. i am sorry for that and i will remedy that in the very near future.
content.summary: Have seen red blinking lights many times, over a 4 month peroid.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were driving on the road at approx. 9:35 pm.  it was dark, slightly hazy, and therefore no stars were visible. at the intersection of rts 15 and 896 (immediately south of the summit bridge) we stopped at a stoplight. we were looking approx. due east waiting for the traffic light to change when we looked up and saw what we thought was a plane.  as it moved toward us, however, we noticed that there were no position or navigation lights (strobes or red/green) on the object that are required on all aircraft flying at night.  instead, the object had a single orange-ish light that pulsated, that seemed to be rotating.  we were unable to discern any shape.  it moved at about the speed a plane would along a straight path, with no erratic movement.  we watched for about another minute more (we had pulled the car over to the shoulder to continue watching) and and at the end of that minute the object was no longer visible, though at the speed it was going it should have still been within our sights.  it could have climbed up into the haze/clouds. regardless, we lost sight of it.

there are several airports nearby. my fiance is a pilot and confirmed he is unaware of any sort of aircraft that has this sort of orange seemingly rotating light, and confirmed that any nighttime flying craft should have strobes or red/green lights, which this object did not have.
content.summary: Orange-colored rotating light (in night sky).

content.detailedDescription:
1 mile south of downtown los angeles. 
periodically, while standing on a sidewalk i would look up at planes and hawks passing overhead. also, as usual were very high altitude planes leaving quantrails. airliners pass low overhead on their downwind leg for lax. 
then, to the north, 30 degrees up from the city lines horizon, i caught sight of a star like object way up high, then perhaps immediately, two.  the sky had many clouds, but they were well apart from each other today. the two stars came close together but were on different courses. then, one changed direction. their speeds from this vantage point was slow but steadily moving. the brighter. no.1 was coming my way south coming closer overhead now about 35 degrees up. still well downrange. the lesser was fading out moving north. periodic. the brighter now seemed to be hovering, motion not apparent, too slow or stopped. now i was ruling out aircraft.  but over several minutes i concluded it was moving my way. i had called a friend over, he saw it too. then a third object, same but brighter  with a metallic shape attached to a star appeared from the south heading north. 15 degrees west of right overhead. faster than the first two, still fairly slow. brighter. like a low satellite at night. my friend saw this too. i purposely did not mention the metallic look just forward on the star, he did, confirming my see.  then, ufo 2, the lesser, had remanifested to make three at the same time. friend confirmed this too.  ufo 3 approached 2, number one still crawled now heading east, much higher now. not brighter. ufo 2 faded out again to the north, 3 went on to the same  direction, fading off in the distance. just no. 1 was left 80 degrees up now straight in front of me, passing off the the right and fading out. 
sunlight was very bright throughout, these star ufos were not reflective or flashy but constantly bright like a planet. speed of no. 1 had changed from slow to very slow, direction had changed but so slowly as not to be noticed except over time. hovering at that altitude rules out helicopter. no quantrails on these. speeds too slow on no. 1 and 2 to be aircraft at that altitude, though 3 could have been very high plane. but i dont think so. my first sighting of such ever. i have taken one report before that i had not seen, had looked for years, but until today, saw nothing i could call unexplained. i see satellites regularly at night, these resembled such except for daytime visibility, apparent interaction, and changes of direction and speed of the first two. balloons are apparent too sometimes in the bright sun, but tend to flash as they turn in the light, and are too low compared to these three. these were very much comparable to the star ufos i see on youtube clips, but were much slower. 
my friend has agreed to write up his version of what he saw seperately. brian
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 ufos high up to the north of the city, two to start, then all three, then one left.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 7:30pm while sitting on my front porch i witnessed the most beautiful color appear in a southern sky. it covered the width of three streets and was roughly rectangular in shape and coverage of the sky. it was a bright turquoise in its center with darker vivid blue and green at its edges and lasted for approx. 2 seconds. there was a plane approaching at the time which veered off to the left of this illuminated area of sky.
i thought i was seeing things, called to my son and waited for a reappearance which did not occur.
i then googled what i had witnessed and found similar stories of recent sightings.
it was truly breathtaking, i hope an explanation can be provided for what i was lucky enough to have witnessed.
content.summary: Brilliant bright turquoise blue flash in a foggy, damp, low visibility sky.

content.detailedDescription: Seen some object while looking at phoenix cams http://www.Phoenixvis.Net/supm1/highres.Html
content.summary: Some object on phoenix cams.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling north on 127 cloudy rainy night wife was driving and some movement caught my eye thru the windshield. looked up and seen a triangle shaped object passing over us. the object was traveling diagonally to our line of direction. the object was between us and cloud cover. my wife did not see it. the sighting did not last long, matter of seconds, lost sight of it as it passed over the car.
content.summary: Triangle shaped light at each corner.

content.detailedDescription: I was following high flying aircraft to take photo with my new camera (canon eos rebel xsi)using a 250mm lens set at shutter priority 1/4000 sec. no filter focus on auto and continous shutter about 3 frames per second.I was in my back deck facing west. the airplane was traveling from ne. to sw. direction, when i was ready to take airplane picture i notice this object coming the oposite way sw. to ne.So i decided to follow object, at first it looked like a round light, but then it started to change forms. i took 41 pictures in sequence,then the object disapeared i am sending you three (3) of them. hope you can tell me what it was.
content.summary: Trying to photo plane, and ufo came into view.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and myself decided to go camping at mt charleston, outside of las vegas, nv. we stayed at the hilltop campground, because it was higher up, and out of the way. after setting up our tent, (it was dark, around 8 pm by this time) a woman (the only other camper in the area due to the time of year) appologized for bothering us, but asked us to come toward there camp site so we could see something. we walked up away from our site, were we met her husband. they pointed toward a distand mountain. what me and my daughter saw was unexplainable. a very large "glow" was "floating" over a distant mountain, illuminating a large section of it. there were three or four of these objects, floating, illuminating, seeming to just float and move with no set pattern. they were orange/ yellow in color, and there size seemed very large, as the mountain in the distance was beign illuminated in sections. i could not make out there shape, because they just seemed to be large floating illuminations of bright light.  after a few moments   they just seemed to "turn of", and there was nothing. after watching for a few, they all vanished. after a few moments of talking with the couple, one came back, followed by the others. they just seemed to appear again. one seemed to be coming closer to the area where we were staying, and i admit, it was a very "uncomfortable" feeling. we continued to watch again, and the distant mountain was ulluminated by the objects that came back. we also watched one of the objects seem to get closer to where we were. it wasnt close enough that we could make out any definitive shape, yet it was closer, and seemed to move in our direction.  the feeling of being uncomfortable was growing stronger. because we were both uncomfortable (it was not a feeling of fear, nor anything other then a strange feeling that i can only describe as uncomfortable, hairs on your neck rising, the same feeling you can get when you feel that someone is watching you yet you cant see them) to pack up. the objects were still there when we finished putting away the tent, and we watched some more. over head, not far off, i saw 4-5 fighter jets, flying overhead, and toward the direction of the objects. i assume these jets were from nellis afb, which is in las vegas. the jets flew quickly and in formation straight toward these objects. the objects did not go away when the jets arrived. deciding it was time to go, we got in our vehicle, and headed out of the camp ground. the couple who originally came to get us to see the onjects had went into there camper and were nowhere to be seen, so we headed out. once we were on outside of the camp ground, and on the road that travels around mt charlston, we saw many vehicles driving towards kyle canyon (it was approx 11 pm at night, so the vehicles where very out of place as the road only goes towards a closed down ski resort and in the direction of the objects). 

we never reported what we saw as we had no camera, and saw nothing in the news, nor did i ever see any report of the incident. we have talked about what we saw on numerous times the past couple of years, and i have still been searching for something similar to what we saw in reports, news programs etc.
content.summary: Large orange lights that illuminated the mountain.

content.detailedDescription: 02/13/09 2119 hrs. i took my dog outside, while he was exploring the yard, i looked west and saw what i first thought was the local medevac chopper coming in from the west. i watched it for a couple of minutes,there were no strobes or navigation/position lights visible, and it seemed to be heading west, but very slowly. i took the dog back in the house,and grabbed my binoculars. i live on the southwestern edge of town, so i jumped into my pickup and headed west on hiway 12 to get away from the lights of town. i proceded to go 4 miles west, and pulled onto an approach and killed the lights and engine. i was facing west so i could brace the binos on the steering wheel to stabilize the image.What i saw through the binos wasn't one, but two objects in close proximity with a connecting beam of light between the two. both objects were circular in shape overall, but  made up of seperate points of light.About 7 or 8.(because of the binos?) the object to the right in my field of vision was partially obscured by the beam of light which appeared to sort of wrap, partially around it. the two objects moved back and forth toward each other and away from each other slightly. i watched this for a few minutes,until the windows started to fog on my truck. i started the vehicle and headed back toward town. i could still see the objects in my rearview mirror appearing as a really bright star until i got into town and i had to pay closer attention to my driving, than the objects. by the time i got back home the objects were no longer visible. it was extremely clear last night 16 degrees 77% humidity wind was nw @4 mph. i hope someone else saw this! i wish now i had stayed until they went away, i also wish my video cam was charged! i really have no idea how far these objects actually were away from me. so i can't say how big they were.
content.summary: Bright light in western sky above horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Weird looking possible blimp and cigar shape on new york web cam more at http://webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Weird looking possible blimp and cigar shape more at http://webcamufo.Com.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were eating at our local wendy's. we always sit in the same location. i sit looking out the window in a southern direction. i looked up into the sky and i noticed a strange looking cloud. the cloud changed from white/grey to a green and then purple color in a matter of seconds. i told my son (15) to look at it. he turned and when he did an oval shaped object flew out of the cloud. it travelled very fast. suddenly it stopped and hovered in place. it was shining very bright with the sun setting. it appeared higher than planes fly but very large. after about a minute it flew to the west very fast and vanished.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large oval object exits cloud, cloud changes color and object flies off.

content.detailedDescription: This happened at my home in flint, tx off lake palestine.  i first noticed a separate star looking oddity that i've reported here before - i actually see that one quite often - it kind of looks as though it's spinning and changes colors.  it looks as though the light rotates when it moves.  while i was watching television and noticed this spinning star thing - i began watching it move during a commercial and suddenly to the left of this star came what i initially though was a plane going down - i couldn't make out a shape b/c it was dark outside, but the lights were red and white like a plane and flashed like i'd expect a plane to do.  but it stopped short - it was going down fast and just stopped and then hovered - long enough for me to watch it for at least a minute and decide to get my camera.  i got the camera but it's an old one and i couldn't capture it due to zoom being so low.  in any case, it slowly, slowly lowered behind the trees northwest of my home.  i've seen some strange things living out here and i don't know what any of it is - i don't have feelings about this anymore (at first i was scared) because i don't know what it is.  i know some things i've been able to explain away, but this was one i could not.  after i lost sight of it and it lowered into the trees i figured it couldn't  hurt to report it here.
content.summary: No shape, just flashing red, white lights.  descended straight down quickly and stopped short, hovered & then began descending very slowly into trees.  northwest from my home.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on the porch whic faces the west sky to see sunsets. i seen a long light in the sky and said the moon sure is weird tonite and had to look twice to see what it was. it was diamond shape with a triangular red - blue lights around it it kept twinkling like the stars then i really watched it kept moving westernly then after i got in the van and had to check that out and followed it not too far it just disappeared.  i never saw anything like that and we see eveything here being underneath a flight path area you see all kinds and hear it too. but not this i thought it really was the moon it was so bright, my pete kept sayin that thing is really low and it must be a plane.  by this time i want some explanations. but get nothing but what the heck was that.  i never thought in a million years it would be there right in front of me.
content.summary: I kept seeing a bright light in the west sky and it was too big to be a plane. so i kept watching it and it kept moving.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my father drove out to utah to pick up my nephew. on the day of my sighting we were driving north out of minneapolis as the sun was going down. on the right side of the interstate i noticed what appeared to be a helicopter hovering near a radio tower. i saw only what looked like a spotlight. i also saw an ambulance driving south on the frontage road with it's lights on so i figured it had something to do with the helicopter with it's spotlight on. as we got closer i suddenly saw that the object was not a helicopter but a triangular object. it was hovering by the radio tower and it was at least a hundred feet in length from corner to corner. it also had lights on each othe corner althouhg i don't remember what color they were. my nephew was asleep and my father was too busy driving in the heavy traffic to notice. i didn't say anything to my father about it because i guess i was in awe not understanding what i was seeing. i wasn't really scared but i felt funny about it. i later thought that if i had told my father about it he would have pulled over to get a closr look and i don't think i would be comfortable with that. i know other people driving that evening had to have seen the same thing as i. later down the road maybe thirty minutes later i looked back in the distance and could still see it hovering above the tree line miles away. i told my father about an hour later and he just laughed at me. i seriously saw a large black triangle with lights on each corner that day and and do not doubt others that have seen the same.
content.summary: We were driving north out of minneapolis when i noticed what i thought was a hovering helicopter but as we got closer i realized it was something different.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo light show near deleon, texas
thursday, february 5, 2009:  7:25 p.M. driving east toward deleon on fm 587
viewed by ronald laduque

i witnessed a ufo light show at 7:25 p.M. while i was about 12 miles west of deleon, tx, and traveling almost due east on fm 587; thursday, feb. 5, 2009.  the light show began near ���duster��� (highway 679 & 587). prior to the light show i observed a very bright, large yellow star or satellite in appearance about 30 degrees above horizon and about 30 degrees south of highway 587. as far as the color and intensity of this large light, it could be compared to a rural farm light of the sodium vapor type. the large ufo light observed would be similar to the large size farm light viewed from a distance of about three miles.

	i noticed this large light in the eastern sky about 7:10 p.M. as i was driving toward it. i was approximately 20 miles west of deleon when i first observed the large, yellow light. as i was driving due east, i watched this light from time to time as it was so bright and large and it drew my attention. the light was positioned close to my rearview mirror so it was easy to 	keep an eye on it as i drove.

	suddenly about 6 or 7 smaller lights, perhaps one-half the size of the bright light, appeared one-by-one to the left of the large light and remained lighted for a few seconds; then all of the small lights turned off simultaneously. these smaller lights were to the left of the bright light and turned on progressively in a south to north direction. these small lights turned on in sequence at about the rate of one per second.

after the small lights had been gone for a few seconds, the same phenomenon happened a little closer to the bright light and south of the first set of small lights.  again, turning on progressively but this time from my left to my right, i.E. north to south. again they all disappeared after all 7 or 8 were turned on  for a few seconds; they all turned off simultaneously.

next, the same sequencing of small lights occurred again but the farthest away from the large light than either of the first two appearances. these lights were again to the north side of the big light. however, peculiar to this set of small lights, this time the last three or four lights turned on in what appeared to be a curved direction heading back to the south; again all small lights disappeared simultaneously. this string of lights came on in a south to north direction, just as did the first set of lights that i observed.

 nothing reappeared for the next few minutes but i then noticed the large light began to get weaker until it was very dim and then disappeared completely. this noticeable dimming process lasted perhaps for 5 or 6 seconds. it is possible that this dimming effect was due to the large light moving directly away from me at an extremely high rate of speed.

i traveled a short distance farther and pulled to the side of the road, turned off the motor and listened for any airplane noise; total silence. i took my field glasses out of the pickup in case the lights reappeared. there was no noise and nothing reappeared. i did not even observe stars at this time. this entire lighting exhibition lasted approximately one minute or less. i noticed how clear the atmosphere was and there was no visible cloud cover in the area of the light show.

the large light and each of the three strings of smaller lights were on a more or less level, horizontal plane  and were about 30 degrees above the horizon. the large light was approximately 30 degrees to the south of my direction of travel; i was traveling almost due east.

the first string of smaller lights was approximately 15 degrees south of the easterly line of my travel; the second string of lights was closer to the large light and about 20 degrees south of my line of travel. the third and final string of lights was the farthest away from the large light and approximately 10 degrees south of my line of travel.

the ufo providing this light show was certainly not concerned about whether or not it would be observed over this populated, rural area early in the evening on a perfectly clear night. perhaps the ufo wished to be observed for some unknown reason. these lights definitely were not flares and could not be any type of aircraft known to the average person.

���unidenified freaky lights��� fill the sky: february 8, 2009   
stephenville empire-tribune (eight witnesses identified; myself not included)
	www.Empiretribune.Com   article by whitney white-ashley
content.summary: One large, bright light; three different series of about 7 smaller lights sequencing on and then all turning off simultaneoulsy; large light then faded away.

content.detailedDescription:
On the above date and time i was sitting with my husband and daughter in the living room area, and watching a movie.

i was seated in a chair that faces south-west, while my husband and daughter were seated in chairs facing approx. north.

within the living room is a large sliding glass door that allows exit to the backyard area. the door also faces south-west and overlooks the tucson mountains with an unimpeded view since there are no homes in that area adjacent our home.
, 
i turned away from the television and glanced out through the sliding glass door. my attention was immediately drawn to an object approx 200 to 300 feet south-west of our backyard. 

although i don���t remember seeing the object moving at that point, i got the impression that it was moving south to north. 

the object was complete with two (2) red lights, (non-strobing) one in the front and one in the rear. although it was dark out i got the impression that the shape of the object was oval. i estimate its altitude at approx. 150-200 feet.

holding my hand stretched out in front of me, with fingers pointing up, i estimate that from light to light, the distance between these two lights would have spanned my hand from little finger to thumb.

as i watched and only a second or two later the object appeared to ���explode��� with a blinding white light, (the size of the explosion would be about the size of a pie plate held at arms length) the object then accelerated at an unbelievable rate of speed and departed, parallel to the ground, in a northerly direction.

there was no noise at any time emitted from this object.

because neither my husband nor daughter was looking in that direction, neither saw the object.

i alerted them to the object and we all ran outside looking for any sign of it.

after about 10 minutes of looking, we all three gave up and returned to the living room.

just as we began to sit down once again, my husband stated that he heard the sounds of helicopters coming in.

all of us went to the back yard once again and watched as two helicopters, moving from the north-west and proceeding in a south-east direction.

my husband who is former air force identified these helicopters as military types. although it was dark and the outlines of the choppers were indistinct they were both about the size of blackhawks, maybe larger.

we could see that as the helicopters approached in tandem, they flew directly over the area where i witnessed the object  ���explode���

the helicopters were moving very slowly (estimated speed of perhaps 50 miles per hour) and i would estimate their altitude at 200-300 feet.

they proceeded to pass our house just to the south and continued flying south-east.

although there is much military air-traffic in this area, and we have witnessed many helicopters in flight, we have never seen them fly this route, nor at this slow of speed, especially during the night.
content.summary: Observed oval object with two red non strobing lights. object appeared to "explode" and took off in a flash. 10 minutes later 2 helicopters were in the area.

content.detailedDescription: Was out playing frisbee with my dog when i saw an object heading north catch the sunlight for a few seconds.  the object had no vapor trail and no sound and was moving about the speed of small plane.  i watched it for a couple minutes when suddenly it disappeared.  felt like it could "hear" my thoughts
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Metallic circular object catches sun light then disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed a single object relatively low in the night sky when approaching home by car.  turned into the drive.  got out of car continued to observe the object (orange ball glowing star-like, wholly unlike a fixed or rotary winged aircraft).  this was also viewed by three other family members.  managed to observe through 8 x 40 binoculars, however unable to discern additional detail.

the object moved silently and relatively slowly on a slightly curved course travelling roughly east south east veering south and seemed to gain altitude and fade out of sight, pulsating slightly as it did so.

i have seen two of these objects before (late december 2008 and early january 2009), which i reported to mufon in early january 2009.

i experienced no impact on feelings during the sighting, remaining calm and rational.
content.summary: Orange coloured glowing ball moving slowly across the night sky in a roughly south south westerly direction.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were outside looking at the stars because i had noticed some "strange stars", a few minutes earlier. my son told me i was seeing heicopters or some other "normal" air traffic.We were about to go in when something looked like it blurred the stars out as it went over us straight and silent. it took about 20 seconds for it to continue to the horizon from where we had first noticed it just about to go over us. at arms length it was the size of your hand. it had no visable outer lights but my son and i agreed on it looked lit as if it had windows around the perimiter emitting light.Also ,the back of it had no visable end. as if it were a "mirage" thnks for listning. was the wierdest thing i have seen yet.My son agrees...
content.summary: Boomerang shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my porch facing south. i often go outside to smoke. i will often look into the night sky. whatever star is in sw sky is bright this time of year. it is just below the moon. and that is when i noticed the object. it was not immediate, but i did see a flash of light. it only flashed once, but i could see what i think to be an outline of an object. the position the object was at the moon's 4-5 o'clock. it was very small. just a pin prick of light. i have seen satellites before in the night sky, but this was not a streak of light across the sky. i noticed the flash first. and when it had my full attention, i could see it move for a split second. i scanned the sky around the moon to see if i could pick it up again. i am reporting this as a ufo event because i can find no other explanation on the internet. not sure what it was.
content.summary: [cms/tg] moving then flash.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband came home from a meeting and was getting out of the truck in our driveway around 8pm last evening.  he noticed a bright star-like object (brighter than venus) in the western sky right above the trees.  he called me out to see it and i return inside the house to get a camera.  my nikon d-60 never gives me any trouble but last night, it just wouldn't work right. it keep zooming in and out on it's own. i did get some shots finally, but the object only looks a very bright star (almost as big as the moon sometimes). (note:  the date the camera is a day later...I suppose we set it wrong when we first got it.)

this could have been the international space station, not sure.  i don't know where it is in the night sky now. (if anyone knows where the iss is located now, please let me know!) i went back outside after the pics i downloaded weren't showing much and it was gone.  the object was very bright whatever it was!

we will look again tonight about the same time to see if it's there again.


that is all to report.
content.summary: Bright star like object seen in the west at 8pm central time.

content.detailedDescription: I happen to look out the back window for some reason and saw what looked like a bright light from a plane moving above the tree tops in the sky. but then it slowed to a stop and hovered there and slowly moved in a circular pattern in the sky while slowly moving down or away. the light never changed brightness. i asked my fiance to look and she took a breif look at it and went back to watching tv. i continued to tell her how the object continued to float around the same area in the sky. i opened the window to get a clear view and when the object moved lower in view below the tree tops and became more difficult to see. i went outside at 8:30pm in the back yard and continued to watch it slowly move down or away, i also took a few pictures. at first i though it was moving away but the brightness of the light did not change. i saw planes flying all around and it seemed like the object was huge and should have been visible to the planes. the object continued to move down in my view into the tree tops so i tried to shine a light out at the object to get it's attention but it seemed to have no response to the light. it was around 9pm by this time when the object disappeared behind the trees but i soon saw it again lower near the forest floor which is when i realized the object may be much closer and much smaller than i initially thought. i looked out using binoculars and saw a yellow light that pulsated and then went out. it came back on and went out a few more times. i made a mental note of where exactly the light was in relation to two trees and my viewpoint out the back window so i could look out again in the morning to see what it was. i also took a few pictures. i looked out another window and it appeared to be on constantly but may have been blocked through the first window by vegetation or was facing another direction. at that point i started to wonder if the light was from someones house. around 6am this morning i looked outside and i still saw the yellow light in the same spot which still made me suspect it is somehow someones light. this morning around 8am i looked outside in the same spot using binoculars and i could only see the forest floor. i thought last night i may have been looking at someones backyard but now it seems i wasn't. i will attach a few pictures i took last night and the same spot this morning. the night pictures are not great since i had to set my camera to "starry night" which takes a 15 second exposure. i tried to keep the shot as still as possible but i was not using a tripod. i took a few pictures of the light in the woods by holding the camera down against the window sill to help stabilize it. i have more photos than the ones attached. i would like to remain anonymous for as far as my name and address since this happened in our backyard and we don't want people trying to run around in the woods behind our house. please feel free to contact me by email for the rest of the pictures, just a few, and for any questions you may have.
content.summary: Bright light floated in sky in backyard for over an hour then slowly came down in woods and possibly landed.

content.detailedDescription: This thing has een in the nights sky for a few nights. the pther report in atlanta last night is probably the same thing im reporting. it is huge and shines likea star and moves slowly in the sk. i set up a camera and the object was above the tree line. over time is slowly had moved back and forth abover the trees. it is huge and so bright,. i zoomed in ad got a close up it was emmitting a blueish yellow and sometimes green light. if i look at it with the plain eye is almost5 flickers. i star gaze all the time and tis is niot a star. i looked at stars these past tweo nights and they have no characteristics that this thing has. not to long ago i saw a huge triangular shaped craft others speak of floating over thr highway. it seemed like a floating city s was so huge.I havwe video of this object if anyone is interested im sure its the same thing the other atlanta report was speaking of.
content.summary: Almost like star but brighter.

content.detailedDescription:
I am writting to you to inform you of a photo that i have found.  believe it or 
not, it was taken for the bbc. 
 
i love science of any kind and am an avid viewer of nature films. recently, i 
borrowed my sisters copy of planet earth 
the complete series. this is a 5 dvd set. 
 
on the back panel of the dvd cover, in a picture of what i assume to be victoria 
falls, i found something that looks 
like a craft either going into or out of the falls. at first i thought that i 
was seeing things.  i even tried to 
wipe it off with a damp cloth. i then went and got my magnifying glass and too a 
closer look. not certain, but it may 
be a craft of some kind. if it is, it's like nothing i have ever seen before. 
 
i would really like to know what you think of it.
content.summary: Found photo of interest.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home, when i saw a craft flying across my path. there were four extremely bright white lights. i couldn't tell what the shape of the object was because it was dark. but it was fairly close to the ground. i didn't make any noise, i thought it was a plane at first (naturally) but it was flying much too fast, too low, and there were no anti collision lights. just 4 really bright lights. all the object did was very quickly fly across my path, so i turned the corner to get a better look at it but it was no where to be seen, it just vanished. 
i immediately told my girlfriend about what had happened. i thought that if i had ever seen a ufo i'd be a little scared, but i wasn't.
content.summary: 4 very very bright lights moving very very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 9pm i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette.The night was clear and there was no wind.I was facing se watching the sky.I`m away from the city so there is less light pollution here.As i turned to walk back inside i saw a disc-shaped black object moving from sw to ne appx.It seemed to pass just at or slightly above tree level.The speed was astonishing and i describe it as disc-shaped but part of it seemed blurred.I couldn`t here it make any noise.
content.summary: Object travelling at tremendous rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mufon,

     to start with, my brother and i were sitting on the back porch having a smoke.  i had went in the house for a couple min. when my brother dan yelled at me to come back out on the porch to see this weird light just over the trees to the west of us.  at first i thought it probably was a bright star, but as we studied it i could clearly see diffrent shape changes and diffrent light flashes with diffrent colored lights at time.  it did'nt take long for both of us to realize what we were looking at was a ufo.
    
     i went into the house and got my camera and proceeded into the yard and then into the street where the object was'nt blocked by trees. the ufo was moving very slowly to the north from where we first saw it, i started my video and as i was filming the object it changed coarse and headed directly west at a straight angle.  i video taped the object for about 10 min. that was more than enough time to get the best ufo show i think i've ever seen  of a night sighting.  

     the ufo started as a very small super bright light than it would expand to diffrent sizes of spheres, sometimes looking like a ball with a dark stripe in the middle and times it appeared to get much larger and looked like the moon, then in an instance it vanish back into the super bright light, then, while doing all these things it would burst into beautiful huge orbs of light, sometimes orange, sometimes green and red.  after filming this for about 10 min.  i knew i had enough footage, this baby had done it all, what a light show this was!!!

    after turning off the camera i continued watching the object continue westward over cushing ok. and still going west at a very slow speed for about another 10 min. then i returned to the house to view the footage via camera to t.V. the whole family could'nt believe their eyes, the video is spectacular, and with no dought in our minds that we were looking at a ufo.  guys you have got to see this video.  now the bad news, i barely know how to send an email so i do not know how to download my sd card video and then send it as an attachment.  if someone wants to call me and give my wife instructions on how to do this, that would be great!                                     
                                        sincerely, tom
content.shape: Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: 10 min. of great video, you have to see this one!

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from helen, ga to blairsville, ga over black moutain/zell miller parkway, now, i drive this mountain pass at least 4 times a week at night, once i reached an elevation of about 2800' and cleared the trees i noticed something quite out of place, this object was definetly not a plane, it wasnt moving. definetly not a star, as the circumfrence was too large, but you could still tell the object was at some distance off...It was just, this bright, spherical/star type object just sitting stationary to the wsw of my position. i pulled over at the peak of the moutain (3500') to get a better view, i obserbed the object for roughly 5 minutes. in that time frame the object seemed to move ever so slightly to the south. whatever it was, it was quite massive. i guestimated the altitude to be about 14-18k ft.

just continued on home after the 5 minutes, too cold at that elevation. and unfortunately did not have a camera in that vehicle.
content.summary: Bright steady light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dogs out through the sliding door facing south around 8:30pm.  it was a clear night.  i looked at what looked like a very bright star directly above the house behind me.  i was thinking to myself, i don't remember seeing a star at there before.  then my kids came over and looked at it. my five year old said, maybe it's a star.  my second thought was maybe it's a helicopter.  but it was so bright, and it was not moving.  i got my camera, just in case.  when i looked at this thing through my camera, it seemed to be changing colors.  as we kept watching this thing after a half an hour we noticed it began moving further away east very slowly.  i have pictures of the object.  it appears to change shapes and colors. after an hour it finally dissapeared. i also took a video with my digital camera.
i don't know if it was anything, but i figured i would report it in case someone else saw something.
the pictures i submitted are difficult to see. the only way you can see the colors and shapes is if you zoom into the pictures.  i used a sony cybershot 8.1 megapixels.  i was on my back deck facing south, with clear view of the sky.  the first is the video, i tried to keep as steady as i could, any movement is my hand not the object.  the second is just a picture of the object. when i zoomed to this one, i saw a face.  kind of like when you look at the moon.  it was pretty cool. in the third picture an airplane passed by.  the plane is the long shape, and the object is round and bright.
i have more pics if needed.

thanks.
content.summary: Object was stationary very bright seemed to change colors.  at first seemed liked helicopter.  but was moving too slow.
